Issue.description: Based on feedback from the design review and subsequent discussion it was decided that the naming of the proposed Network class did not reflect the fabric architecture, and that it more correctly represents a connection to a peer or, in the case of HA, a set of peers. It was decided that the name 'Gateway' was better for that class. It was also decided that the concept (and name) of Network was best applied to the fabric-network/Channel class.
